00011 void joyCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& msg){
00012         if (msg->buttons[RIGHT_BUTTON] >.1) {
00013                 //Control velocities with joysticks
00014                 float scale = 1;
00015                 if ((msg->axes[LEFT_TRIGGER] >= -.5) || (msg->axes[RIGHT_TRIGGER]>= -.5))scale = .5;
00016                 if ((msg->axes[LEFT_TRIGGER] >= -.5) && (msg->axes[RIGHT_TRIGGER]       >= -.5))scale = .125;
00017                 if (msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS] < 0){
00018                         sendVelocityMessage(shoulderMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS]*-shoulderMotor.homeVelocity*scale));
00019                 }
00020                 else if (msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS] >= 0){
00021                          sendVelocityMessage(shoulderMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS]*-shoulderMotor.homeVelocity*scale));
00022                 }
00023                 if (msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS] < 0){
00024                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS]*panMotor.homeVelocity*scale));
00025                 }
00026                 else if (msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS] >= 0){
00027                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS]*panMotor.homeVelocity*scale));
00028                 }
00029                 if(msg->buttons[SELECT_BUTTON] > .1 || msg->buttons[START_BUTTON] ){
00030                         if(msg->buttons[SELECT_BUTTON] > .1){
00031                                 sendVelocityMessage(scoopMotor,(int)(-scoopMotor.homeVelocity*scale));
00032                         }
00033                         else sendVelocityMessage(scoopMotor,(int)(scoopMotor.homeVelocity*scale));
00034                 }
00035                 else sendVelocityMessage(scoopMotor,(int)(0));
00036                 if(msg->buttons[CENTER_BUTTON] > .1){
00037                         if(!shoulderMotor.isHoming)dropOffRock();
00038                 }
00039         }
00040         else {
00041                 sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,0);
00042                 sendVelocityMessage(shoulderMotor,0);
00043                 sendVelocityMessage(scoopMotor,0);
00044         }
00045 }
00046 
00047 void driverJoyCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& msg){
00048         //If the Left or Right Button is Pressed
00049         if (msg->buttons[RIGHT_BUTTON] >.1 || msg->buttons[LEFT_BUTTON] >.1) {
00050                         //Control velocities with joysticks
00051                 float scale = 1;
00052                 if ((msg->axes[LEFT_TRIGGER] >= -.5) || (msg->axes[RIGHT_TRIGGER]>= -.5))scale = .5;
00053                 if ((msg->axes[LEFT_TRIGGER] >= -.5) && (msg->axes[RIGHT_TRIGGER]       >= -.5))scale = .125;
00054                                 if (msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS] < 0){
00055                                         sendVelocityMessage(shoulderMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS]*scale*-shoulderMotor.homeVelocity));
00056                                 }
00057                                 else if (msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS] >= 0){
00058                                          sendVelocityMessage(shoulderMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS]*scale*-shoulderMotor.homeVelocity));
00059                                 }
00060                                 if (msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS] < 0){
00061                                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS]*scale*panMotor.homeVelocity));
00062                                 }
00063                                 else if (msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS] >= 0){
00064                                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS]*scale*panMotor.homeVelocity));
00065                                 }
00066                                 if(msg->buttons[SELECT_BUTTON] > .1 || msg->buttons[START_BUTTON] ){
00067                                         if(msg->buttons[SELECT_BUTTON] > .1){
00068                                                 sendVelocityMessage(scoopMotor,(int)(-scoopMotor.homeVelocity*scale));
00069                                         }
00070                                         else sendVelocityMessage(scoopMotor,(int)(scoopMotor.homeVelocity*scale));
00071                                 }
00072                                 else sendVelocityMessage(scoopMotor,(int)(0));
00073                 }
00074         else {
00075                 sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,0);
00076                 sendVelocityMessage(shoulderMotor,0);
00077                 sendVelocityMessage(scoopMotor,0);
00078         }
00079 }
00080 
00081 void dropOffRock(){
00082         shoulderMotor.isHoming=true;
00083         epos_manager::EPOSControl shoulderMsg;
00084         shoulderMsg.node_id=shoulderMotor.nodeId;
00085         shoulderMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE;
00086         shoulderMsg.setpoint = -230000;
00087         arm_publisher.publish(shoulderMsg);
00088 //      ros::spinOnce();
00089         sleep(2);
00090         epos_manager::EPOSControl panMsg;
00091         panMsg.node_id=panMotor.nodeId;
00092         panMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE;
00093         panMsg.setpoint = 50;
00094         arm_publisher.publish(panMsg);
00095 //      ros::spinOnce();
00096         sleep(3);
00097         epos_manager::EPOSControl scoopMsg;
00098         scoopMsg.node_id=scoopMotor.nodeId;
00099         scoopMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE;
00100         scoopMsg.setpoint = -1300000;
00101         arm_publisher.publish(scoopMsg);
00102         shoulderMotor.isHoming=false;
00103         sleep(4);
00104 
00105 }
00106 
00107 void sendVelocityMessage(homingData motor, int velocity){
00108         epos_manager::EPOSControl controlMsg;
00109         controlMsg.node_id=motor.nodeId;
00110         controlMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::VELOCITY;
00111         controlMsg.setpoint=velocity;
00112         arm_publisher.publish(controlMsg);
00113 }

00115 int main (int argc, char **argv){
00116         ros::init(argc, argv, "ArmManager");
00117         ros::NodeHandle n;
00118 
00119         panMotor.nodeId=ARM_PAN;
00120         scoopMotor.nodeId=ARM_SCOOP;
00121         shoulderMotor.nodeId=ARM_SHOULDER;
00122 
00123         panMotor.timesToIgnore=5;
00124         scoopMotor.timesToIgnore=5;
00125         shoulderMotor.timesToIgnore=5;
00126 
00127         panMotor.homeVelocity = 1000;
00128         scoopMotor.homeVelocity = 1000;
00129         shoulderMotor.homeVelocity = 1000;
00130 
00131         panMotor.homeCurrent = 100;
00132         scoopMotor.homeCurrent = 100;
00133         shoulderMotor.homeCurrent = 100;
00134 
00135         ros::param::get("~Pan_Velocity",panMotor.homeVelocity);
00136         ros::param::get("~Pan_Current",panMotor.homeCurrent);
00137         ros::param::get("~Shoulder_Velocity",shoulderMotor.homeVelocity);
00138         ros::param::get("~Shoulder_Current",shoulderMotor.homeCurrent);
00139         ros::param::get("~Scoop_Velocity",scoopMotor.homeVelocity);
00140         ros::param::get("~Scoop_Current",scoopMotor.homeCurrent);
00141 
00142         panMotor.angle=0;
00143         shoulderMotor.angle=0;
00144 
00145         panMotor.isHoming=false;
00146         shoulderMotor.isHoming=false;
00147         scoopMotor.isHoming=false;
00148 
00149 
00150         ros::Subscriber joy_subscriber = n.subscribe("joy", 1, joyCallback);
00151         ros::Subscriber driver_joy_subscriber = n.subscribe("DriverJoy", 1, driverJoyCallback);
00152 
00153 //      ros::Subscriber arm_motor_info_subscriber = n.subscribe("motors/Arm_Motors/Motor_Info", 1, motorInfoCallback);
00154         arm_publisher = n.advertise<epos_manager::EPOSControl>("motors/Arm_Motors/Motor_Control", 5);
00155         group_arm_publisher = n.advertise<epos_manager::GroupEPOSControl>("motors/Arm_Motors/Group_Motor_Control", 5);
00156 
00157 
00158 
00159         ros::spin();
00160 }
